text: The Microcaecilia supernumeraria is a species of Caecilians. They belong to the family Caeciliidae. They live in Brazil. Their habitats are subtropical or tropical forests. They like to live in lowland forests and rural places. ==References== * Silvano, D., Narvaes, P. & Wilkinson, M. 2004. Microcaecilia supernumeraria. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 July 2007. Category:Caecilians
title: Microcaecilia supernumeraria
